PrecisGrant of leave to Mr. Justice Allan P. Boudreau, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia appointed on March 29, 1990, to reside in the Village of Church Point, Nova Scotia, until June 30, 1990, for travelling allowance purposes.
